BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.arguments.BootstrapArguments.getAddresses() accesses list or array with constant index
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.arguments.BootstrapArguments.getConfigurationPath() accesses list or array with constant index
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.arguments.BootstrapArguments.getForce() accesses list or array with constant index
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.arguments.BootstrapArguments.getSocketPath() accesses list or array with constant index
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.arguments.BootstrapArguments.getPort() throws alternative exception from catch block without history
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.arguments.BootstrapArguments.isValidPath(String) throws alternative exception from catch block without history
This API (java/nio/file/Paths.get(Ljava/lang/String;[Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/nio/file/Path;) reads a file whose location might be specified by user input
org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.config.LogbackConfiguration.createConsolePatternLayout(LoggerContext): 1st parameter 'loggerContext' could be declared as ch.qos.logback.core.Context instead
Unconstrained method new org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.database.DatabaseServerInfo(DataSource) converts checked exception to unchecked
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.exception.DatabaseServerLoadingServerException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.version.ShardingSphereProxyVersion.getProxyVersion() stores return result in local before immediately returning it
